info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 16 at 9:02PM EDT until June 16 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN ORANGE, WEST CENTRAL SPOTSYLVANIA AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 902 PM EDT, Between 2 and 4.5 inches of rain have fallen. There are several reports of flooding across Orange County, especially in the town of Orange. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Orange... Nasons... Madison Run... Lahore... Madison Mills... Unionville... Montford... Thornhill... Montpelier Station... Twymans Mill... Old Somerset... Aroda... FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
